description:
Amazingly placed so close to the popular Westfield Doncaster Shopping Centre, and promising versatility, functionality, and captivating contemporary charm, this 4 bedroom, 3.5 bathroom residence is a modern delight for those who aspire to experience a sleek Doncaster townhouse.

A ground level gives you access to a small study nook just off the entry, as well as large under stairs storage which will definitely come in handy. The north-facing lounge and dining zone is dominated by timber floors and will be perfect for everyday living, with this space having access to a northern deck and garden which will be a breeze to enjoy outdoor BBQs in the warm summer months.

The stone kitchen features an island bench and stainless steel Miele appliances, while also on the first floor is the spacious master bedroom which promises a walk-in robe and deluxe ensuite. The very top level is home to 3 more bedrooms with BIRs, including one bedroom with an ensuite and the other two bedrooms which share a bathroom (both with direct access). Also enjoy a laundry, powder room, reverse cycle heating and cooling, ducted vacuum, single remote garage, and additional off-street car space.

Zoned for Doncaster Primary School and Doncaster Secondary College, and close to Schramms Reserve, Koonung Creek Trail with surrounding parklands, Jackson Court Shopping Centre, buses, and Eastern Freeway with Park n Ride options.
